description: The Canadian Government is seeking low-cost lubricating oil for the Department of National Defence. Purchase quantities include at least 32 units of 200L drums from Canada.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
======================================

### W0103-239286_B - Lubricating Oil

#### Government Agency
------------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* Phone:
* Email: [christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca][christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca]

#### Tender Details
-----------------------

* **Tender Number:** WS3696041898
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-07
* **Closing Date:** 2022-12-08T14:00:00
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:**
	+ Lowest Price

#### Tender Description
------------------------

The Department of National Defence requires the supply, delivery, and offloading of 32 drums of Lubricating Oil conforming to the minimum mandatory performance specifications in Annex “A3." The delivery must be made to Department of National Defence, CFB Esquimalt, Building 597 (Canteen Road Gate), Victoria, British Columbia V9A 7N2, with an option for up to 36 additional drums. The delivery is a mandatory requirement and must be completed by March 31, 2023.

#### Notice URL
----------------

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14837251?extsite=MTQ4MzcyNTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

[christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca]: mailto:christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca "christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca"  # markdown link <https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.google.com/url?q%3Ds%3A%2F%2Fwebmail.tpsgc%7Ctrampoline.ca%7Cu%3Dgmail.com%3Cmailto%3
